title: What are first and third world problems? - Quora

response.answer_text: That many people think first and third world countries is a scale or how much developed is a country. First world countries were NATO countries and the allies of the USA in the cold warSecond World countries Were the Soviets, China and thier allies in the cold warThird world countries were the neutral countries in the cold warThus making Switzerland, Sweden, and Finnland a third world countries, and Making Germany a 1.5th world Country.
